table_description: AWS VPC Verified Access Trust Provider

columns.name: verified_access_trust_provider_id
columns.description: The ID of the AWS Verified Access trust provider.

columns.name: description
columns.description: A description for the AWS Verified Access trust provider.

columns.name: device_trust_provider_type
columns.description: The type of device-based trust provider.

columns.name: policy_reference_name
columns.description: The identifier to be used when working with policy rules.

columns.name: trust_provider_type
columns.description: The type of Verified Access trust provider.

columns.name: user_trust_provider_type
columns.description: The type of user-based trust provider.

columns.name: oidc_options
columns.description: The OpenID Connect details for an oidc-type, user-identity based trust provider.
